profileAlternative.name: Todd Haskell
profileAlternative.headline: Senior Vice President, Chief Marketing Officer at Hearst Magazines
profileAlternative.summary:
Experienced leader of large sales and marketing organizations in online and offline media, including newspapers, magazines, and mobile.

Specialties: Experienced in facilitating organizational change.

aboutAlternative.text:
Experienced leader of large sales and marketing organizations in online and offline media, including newspapers, magazines, and mobile.

Specialties: Experienced in facilitating organizational change.

positions.title: Hearst Magazines
positions.description: Responsible for all corporate marketing functions for world's largest magazine publisher, as well as PR and industry marketing activities. Leads creative development for advertising programs across print, digital, social and video for Hearst's 25 magazine brands, reaching 146 million readers each month.

roles.title: Senior Vice President, Chief Marketing Officer

positions.title:
Title
Senior Vice President, Chief Revenue Officer, Hearst Magazines Digital Media
positions.description: Responsible for driving the sales and marketing revenue for Hearst Magazine Digital Media’s 18 sites, including magazine brand sites Cosmopolitan.com, Esquire.com, Elle.com and GoodHousekeeping.com and food pure-play Delish.com. Hearst Magazines Digital Media sites engaged with 54 million unique visitors (ComScore May 2015).

roles.title: Senior Vice President, Chief Revenue Officer, Hearst Magazines Digital Media

positions.title: Group Vice President - Advertising
positions.description:
Responsible for all digital advertising sales & strategy at NYTimes.com, plus print/digital category responsibilities at The New York Times (newspaper, magazines, online & mobile) including American Fashion, International Fashion, Department & Mass Market stores, Cosmetics, Fashion & Jewelry stores, Movie Studios, Live Entertainment, Books, Media, Fine Arts, and Travel, plus all international sales offices.
